name: Model Eight
description:
PLOT
The flagship "CloudBuster" must be destroyed. Using the Travelers Network; Model Eight sets out to end it.

GAMEPLAY
This is an STG, or shoot em' up. You shoot enemies, and in turn they will shoot at you in an effort to eliminate you.

A gameplay mechanic featured here revolves around the player destroying enemies, and collecting the scrap that is released by them. Accumulated scrap can then be repurposed into items that increase the ship capabilities.

DIFFICULTY
Intermediate difficulty.
